text: Immunohistochemical staining for HSV-1 in a fixated cyot-spun obtained from BAL from Case 2 identifying a positive cell (dark brown colour) Figure 2 Immunohistochemical staining for HSV-1 in a fixated cyotspun obtained from BAL from Case 2 identifying a positive cell (dark brown colour). Bottom and left: alveolar macrophages and lymphocytes with degenerative changes.
